title: Concept for a ultimate/legendary Annie skin
body:
Annie is one of my favorite champions and I came across this thought while looking at some fan arts.
Skin name: Future Annie
Model: Namely she is now from the future and thus all grown up, to have such power when a child means in the future she would be almost omnipotent like Xerath or Syndra, in this case she would use a body similar to Syndra, while walking on ground she has flaming footprints to show her power similar to Illidan Stormrage from Warcraft III
Q: Not much could be changed about her Q since it is a simple single target ability, although it could relate to the passive where the stacks influence the color of the flame, as it slowly becomes hotter from red to blue
W: Instead of breathing fire she is now able to command flames with a single swing of her arm. where she would stand and hold her arm out as though she was traffic control and the flame particles would last slightly longer, continually emanating from her hand (still make this animation-cancel-able though). The color of  the fire again could depend on the stack of the passive.
E: Instead of a coat flames Annie pushes herself in the air with power and hovers (syndra/malzahar), creating a ring of fire below her leaving behind a trail as she walks (something like xerath ult). Tibbers could also be enlarged slightly during the E.
R: As you level up the ulti Tibbers starts off as a realistic flaming bear (with fire on the back, arms and legs), at lvl 11 becomes too powerful for its own body and becomes a spirit of pure fire (in the shape of a bear) and at lvl 16 changes color (or other things).

I know this sounds like many things pulled together from other champions, but they are merely inspirations, as Annie is already so powerful as a child, I just really want to see a future her where she is (or just looks) super overpowered, if any Rioter sees this and is fond of this concept please make it real :D Ty
